name: Die Trying (ryaniamteon)
description:
explore the casino and eliminate hordes of enemies using dice as ammunition, dice up on your screen as you collect poker chip's. use three special dice guns to fire them at enemies before they cover your view.

Future updates are planned, current condition is a bit rough. We planned to have physical dice to be a part of the game but is not currently visible in this build.


Coding - Roanock

Art - Ryanimateon, Robin E

Music & Sound - Max Nattrass, MARROW
